text: phir jab un do phasaadon mein pahale ka vakt aa pahuncha to hamane tum par kuchh apane bandon (najatulanasr) aur usakee phauj ko musallat (gaalib) kar diya jo bade sakht ladane vaale the to vah log tumhaare gharon ke andar ghuse (aur khoob qatl va gaarat kiya) aur khuda ke azaab ka vaayada jo poora hokar raha
